main event: In Gower, Missouri, on August 7th at 0730, a civilian reported a large, lane-shaped object with a metallic surface and a bluish-white glow around the midsection. The object was 30-40 feet long, 10-12 feet high, and made a steep climb before disappearing with no observed sound or exhaust.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a large, lane-shaped object with a metallic surface and a bluish-white glow around the midsection.
It was observed for a brief moment as it made a steep climb and left the area without any sound.
No vapor trail or exhaust was observed, indicating unconventional propulsion.
The civilian witness reported seeing the object for 1 minute and 15 seconds, providing a detailed observation.
The object disappeared in the direction of Gower, leaving the area with no trace.
sighted object: large, lane-shaped UFO with a metallic surface and bluish-white glow
